DOC.brief_summary: The stapled transanal rectal resection (STARR procedure) is an effective treatment for obstructed defecation syndrome (ODS) caused by intussusception and rectocele. Recently a new technique has been developed using the new Contour® TranstarTM stapler, which was specifically designed to facilitate the STARR procedure. The investigators would like to evaluate the morbidity and quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Stapled TransAnal Rectal Resection (STARR) With Contour® TranstarTM
DOC.criteria: Rectocele Intussusception Non operability inflammatory bowel disease
